flavorText:
"I'd rather hear the screams of battle than the quiet that follows."
—Talara, elvish safewright

foreignData.flavorText: „Ich höre lieber die Geräusche einer Schlacht als die Stille, die ihr folgt." —Talara, elfische Sichermacherin
foreignData.name: Heiliges Begräbnis
foreignData.text: Lege alle Kreaturen unter die Bibliotheken ihrer Besitzer.

foreignData.flavorText: "Prefiero escuchar los gritos de la batalla que el silencio que le sigue." —Talara, refugiante élfica
foreignData.name: Entierro consagrado
foreignData.text: Pon todas las criaturas en el fondo de las bibliotecas de sus propietarios.

foreignData.flavorText: « Je préfère les cris de la bataille au silence qui s'en suit. » —Talara, protecturge elfe
foreignData.name: Enterrement sacré
foreignData.text: Mettez toutes les créatures au-dessous des bibliothèques de leurs propriétaires.

foreignData.flavorText: "Preferisco le urla della battaglia al silenzio che ne segue." —Talara, salvaincanti elfica
foreignData.name: Sepoltura Consacrata
foreignData.text: Metti tutte le creature in fondo ai grimori dei loro proprietari.

foreignData.flavorText: 「戦いの悲鳴を聞く方が、その後の静寂を耳にするよりもまだましです。」 ――エルフの守美者、タララ
foreignData.name: 神聖なる埋葬
foreignData.text: すべてのクリーチャーをオーナーのライブラリーの一番下に置く。

foreignData.flavorText: "Eu prefiro ouvir os gritos de batalha ao silêncio que se segue." — Talara, pulcro-protetora élfica
foreignData.name: Funeral Glorificado
foreignData.text: Coloque todas as criaturas no fundo do grimório de seus donos.

foreignData.flavorText: «Мне милее шум битвы, чем воцаряющаяся вслед тишина». — Талара, эльфийская охранительница
foreignData.name: Священное Погребение
foreignData.text: Положите все существа в низ библиотек их владельцев.

foreignData.flavorText: 「我宁愿听到战斗中的呼号，也不愿忍受其后的寂静。」 ～地精美境卫塔萝拉
foreignData.name: 神圣入土
foreignData.text: 将所有生物分别置于其拥有者的牌库底。

name: Hallowed Burial
originalText: Put all creatures on the bottom of their owners' libraries.

rulings.text: All creatures leave the battlefield simultaneously. They’re not destroyed; they’re just put on the bottom of their owners’ libraries. This includes token creatures, though they’ll cease to exist as soon as Hallowed Burial finishes resolving.

Each player chooses the relative order of the cards they are putting on the bottom of their library, regardless of who controlled them while they were on the battlefield. Players don’t reveal this order to other players.

text: Put all creatures on the bottom of their owners' libraries.
